name: One Last Goodbye
description:
When Pei-er wakes up from a long slumber one day, she finds that the world around her has irrevocably changed. But.. but… she had only carelessly fallen asleep out in the woods one sleepy afternoon… or so she thought.

A strange man who she comes to know as Mr. Bill tells her that she can no longer go back to the world she once knew. But how can things have changed, when that precious person she has always held in her heart is still there, showing up one day most unexpectedly?

Some lagging may occur in the browser version of the game, especially with music or sound effects.
For the full experience please load the downloadable version.

  • An original story with over 40k words
    (and to be extended after Spooktober Jam if original plot idea is unable to be fully included in time)
  • 6 different endings
    (new revelations come in each ending about this world and its characters)
  • Aside from main characters, there are also several other important characters who propel the story.
    (Not all characters will have their sprites made in time for Spooktober, but they will be added afterwards.)
  • Side image for MC and a customisable name.

To be supplemented after Spooktober Jam

  • CGs
  • Sprites for side characters (where needed)

Screenshots

Marie Marie Studio is the sole developer of the game.

Resources made available in the public domain have been used in the game, either unaltered in their original forms or edited.

Credits for resources requiring attribution will be listed in the game.
